game.name: SplatPed Evo
game.description:
You are always in a win-win situation when you are living in a developed city. It is easy for you to find out a number of visiting places and have fun while roaming here and there in those side streets. Spot some beautiful ramps and get ready to perform a few insane twists and flips! The presence of unlocked camera will also allow you to see and enjoy every stunt closely from different angles. Choose from a set of some highly exciting vehicles and ride your vehicle at top speed in this beautiful 3D car racing game for boys!

SplatPed Evo is an awesome free online driving simulation game with ultimate 3D graphics. You will have an option to choose from a sports car to a fire truck. Off-road cars are good to explore the nearby mountains, luxury cars are meant for enjoying the top speeds and extreme acceleration and, with a firetruck, you can have a ride anywhere you want. Take your seat in your chosen car, fasten your seatbelt and allow yourself to get into the world of driving action with complete freedom. You are free to explore the nearby rocky hill and a vast wonderful city in this brand new and cool driving simulator.

Keep your eyes on the pedestrians, who might be puzzled when you pass by them. There are plenty of ramps available for you to perform different kinds of eye-popping stunts. Spot them while roaming from one city to another and do your job perfectly to become a king of the road in this PC game! Avoid crashing your vehicle since you will have to repair it instantly in case if any damage happens to it. Feel free to step into any car you like and have a fun in this one of the best car driving games! Game controls: WASD or arrow keys to drive, Spacebar to use handbrake, enter to unflip, R to repair car, C to change camera and T to activate time frame mode.

game.metaDesc: Play the online free game SplatPed Evo at atmegame.com ! We have selected this car games for best excitement and thrill in you!
